title: Vacheron Constantin Just Unveiled the World’s Most Complicated Watch | Flipboard
text: Vacheron Constantin Just Unveiled the World’s Most Complicated Watch With 63 complications, the Berkley Grand Complication tops Vacheron Constantin's own previous nine-year world record.
